name: Raidboss
description:
LUDUM DARE 37

In this game YOU play as a raid boss, defending himself from a band of lootthirsty adventurers.

To defend yourself you'll need to activate special boss phases that give you powerfull abilities, like cluster explosions, flaming ground and a lot of crowd controll skills! Use left and right mouse buttons to activate those skills.

To activate a phase, just press Q, W, E or R!

Have fun and good luck!

This game was created with unity in a team of 3 developers: Marcin Jóźwik, Daniel Kowalski, Jakub Rogalski. Audio and font are the things we didn't make in this game.
